22-027TI.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes from the Technology & Innovation Commission meeting held Wednesday, August 24, 2022.This agenda item was approved.Yes: 5 - Lisa Mae Brunson, Jonathan de Armas, Parisa Vinzant, Gwen Shaffer and Robb KorinkeExcused: 2 - Justin Hectus and Javier OrtizPage 1 of 3TELECONFERENCE, 3:30 PMWEDNESDAY, SEPTEMBER 28, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHTECHNOLOGY AND INNOVATION COMMISSION MINUTES22-028TIRecommendation to receive and file an update on the distribution of the Technology & Innovation Commission white paper titled "Analysis and recommendations for regulating facial recognition technology and other "smart" devices and platforms", and the Equity and Human Relations Commission recommendations related to the City's use of Facial Recognition Technology, and to discuss next steps for distribution and outreach for both documents.2.Lea Eriksen, Director of Technology & Innovation, spoke.Commissioner Vinzant, spoke.Vice Chair, Brunson, spoke.Commissioner Vinzant, spoke.Vice Chair, Brunson, spoke.This agenda item was approved.Yes: 5 - Lisa Mae Brunson, Jonathan de Armas, Parisa Vinzant, Gwen Shaffer and Robb KorinkeExcused: 2 - Justin Hectus and Javier Ortiz3.
